participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Ava is enthusiastic and loves to share her passions with others. She is sociable and enjoys connecting with people who have similar interests.
participant_1.background: I am a very tall woman. I love to cook ethnic foods. I love to draw. I have very curly hair.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is introspective and enjoys the comfort of familiar activities. He has a unique perspective on life due to his experiences and enjoys engaging in hobbies that allow him to express himself.
participant_2.background: I play games at the arcade, still. I listen to Linkin Park, I don't know why. I was diagnosed with autism. I haven't done anything since high school. People in school said I was quiet.

content.text: Hi!
Hi!
What are you doing today?
I'm playing games at the arcade.
That sounds like fun! What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play rhythm games and action games.
Oh, I love rhythm games too! What's your favorite rhythm game?
My favorite rhythm game is Dance Dance Revolution.
I love Dance Dance Revolution too! I've been playing it since high school.
Me too! It's so much fun.
What other games do you like to play?
I also like to play action games like Call of Duty and Halo.
Oh, I love Call of Duty too! I've been playing it since the first one came out.
Me too! It's my favorite game series.
What do you like about Call of Duty?
I like the action and the multiplayer.
Me too! It's so much fun to play with friends.
It is! I've made so many friends playing Call of Duty.
Me too! It's a great way to meet new people.
It is! I'm glad we both like Call of Duty.
Me too! It's a great game.
